Title: Relates to capital program plans
Summary: Relates to capital program plans; provides that the MTA shall submit to the MTA capital program review board two capital program plans on or before January 31, 2026 and every fifth year thereafter; provides that all future capital program plans be submitted January 31 of the required years.
LawCode: Amd ยง1269-b, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to capital program plans
